doc.field: GENERALE DE BANQUE, HELLER BUY FACTORING UNIT

- Generale de Banque SA [GENB.BR] and [Heller Overseas Corp] of Chicago have each taken 50 pct stakes in factoring company SA Belgo-Factors, Generale de Banque said in a statement. It gave no financial details of the transaction. SA Belgo-Factors' turnover in 1986 was 17.5 billion Belgian francs.
